snippet: Sheldon G. Adelson, the American billionaire casino magnate, is set to build a giant resort around Madrid, ending a bidding battle between the Spanish capital and Barcelona.
abstract: American billionaire casino magnate Sheldon G Adelson is set to build a giant resort around Madrid, ending a bidding battle between that cityl and Barcelona; his company Las Vegas Sands offers few clues on how it will be financed or how big it will be.
lead_paragraph: Sheldon G. Adelson, the American billionaire casino magnate, is set to build a giant resort around Madrid, ending a bidding battle between the Spanish capital and Barcelona.

headline.seo: Madrid Will Be Site of Sheldon Adelson Casino and Resort
headline.main: Adelson Chooses Madrid Over Barcelona for New Casino
headline.print_headline: Las Vegas Sands Announces A Resort Complex in Madrid
